$$$.inited = () => $$.state
$$$.loadjson = async () =>
  await load(JSON.parse(await (await fetch("101.json")).text()))
$$$.current = async () => log(await read($$.name))

skip(inited)
style(document.html, {overflow:"hidden"})
style(document.body, {position:"relative", userSelect:"none"})
style(document.body, {background:"#745f65", color:"white"})

css(".page", { width:"100%" })
css(".page", {textAlign:"center", position:"absolute"})
css(".page", {transition:"all 0.5s"})
css(".content", {transition:"all 0.5s"})

$.p1({t:"env.js 101", subt:"——交互式开发工具介绍", au:"ch3coohlink@2021"})
$.p2({t:"测试中的第二页"})

$.ps1(({top})=>style(top, {top:"30%"}))
$.ps2(({top})=>style(top, {top:"200vh"}))
